Sentencas: This work investigated the use of laser chemical vapor deposition (LCVD) to apply an yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) thin film electrolyte to a porous Ni metal/YSZ substrate.
Titulo: Preparation of an yttria-stabilized zirconia electrolyte on a porous Ni-based cermet substrate by laser chemical vapor deposition

Sentencas: Using this process, a dense YSZ film having a columnar structure and small grain sizes was successfully fabricated on a porous cermet substrate at a relatively low temperature of approximately 700 degrees C. A 15 mu m thick film was obtained following a deposition time of only 20 min.
Titulo: Preparation of an yttria-stabilized zirconia electrolyte on a porous Ni-based cermet substrate by laser chemical vapor deposition

Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) power generation tests were performed using the sample on which YSZ was deposited and stable power generation was observed.
Titulo: Preparation of an yttria-stabilized zirconia electrolyte on a porous Ni-based cermet substrate by laser chemical vapor deposition

Sentencas: However, the open circuit voltages were lower than the theoretical values and the ohmic loss of the specimen was significantly higher than that estimated from the conductivity of YSZ.
Titulo: Preparation of an yttria-stabilized zirconia electrolyte on a porous Ni-based cermet substrate by laser chemical vapor deposition

Sentencas: These inferior performance parameters can possibly be attributed to the formation of cracks in the electrolyte film during the SOFC test, and thus enhanced performance could be obtained by suppressing crack formation.
Titulo: Preparation of an yttria-stabilized zirconia electrolyte on a porous Ni-based cermet substrate by laser chemical vapor deposition

Sentencas: In addition, the reason for the crack formation was also discussed in this work.
Titulo: Preparation of an yttria-stabilized zirconia electrolyte on a porous Ni-based cermet substrate by laser chemical vapor deposition
